creator: wangkai_steven@163.com
text: i used HSSFSheet.protectSheet() method , it only can prevent from being edited,can not stop readers to select and copy excel content,i wonder how to make it.

HSSFSheet.protectSheet() implements default protection options. Custom protection like prevention cells from being copied is not supported.

P.S. POI Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please post your questions to the poi-user mailing list.

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
